## Library


```{r library}


library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

```


## Read in Data

```{r read in data}

osm <- st_read(here("greater-london-latest-free","gis_osm_pois_free_1.shp"))%>%
  st_transform(.,27700)%>%
  filter(fclass == "hotel")
  #change to: OSGB 1936 / British National Grid: ESPSG: 27700
  #filter rows where fclass colomn shows hotels
   

plot(LondonBoroughs) <- st_read(here("statistical-gis-boundaries-london","ESRI", "London_Borough_Excluding_MHW.shp" )) %>%
  st_transform(.,27700)


Worldcities <-  st_read(here("World_Cities","World_Cities.shp"))%>%
  st_transform(.,27700)


ukoutline <- st_read(here("uk_outline","gadm36_GBR_0.shp"))%>%
  st_transform(.,27700)
  

  
```
